key_talking_points: Penalty on Edmonton's Kailer Yamamoto for tripping Sam Reinhart. Florida goes to the power play for 2 minutes at 16:28 remaining in the first period. The score is 5-4 for Florida.
The game remains close at 5-4. Shots are high - FLA with 42, EDM with 46 - suggesting an open, offensive game so far.
Review of Reinhart's performance so far - his ability to draw penalties, his scoring record, and how Edmonton needs to adjust their game to contain him.
